analyzed: zhi bya dug skyes dug gis gso //🔽zhes bya ba la /

translated: Likewise, one should cure a fever by the method of curing the disease, by the method of using medicine, and by the method of knowing what is beneficial and what is not.🔽Fever arising from anger is cured by the satisfaction of desire.

analyzed: zhes bya ba la / khros pa las byung ba'i rims ni 'dod pa'i yul dang phrad cing bsten pas zhi bar 'gyur ro //

translated: One should avoid exertion, bathing, sex, heavy food, unaccustomed and hot things, and anything else that produces fever, until one’s strength is fully restored.🔽A person who is afflicted by fever should avoid strenuous exertion, bathing, sex, heavy food,

analyzed: gang phyir myur du gsod 'gyur bas //

analyzed: de'i phyir de ni khyad par du //

analyzed: mi drod zhan pa la ni sman skyur pa dang tsha ba phan na /

translated: Also, in the same way, one should prepare a decoction of the juice of the root of the white variety of turmeric and a paste of the root of the white variety of turmeric, adding ghee. This also destroys blood and bile.

analyzed: mdud par chags nad mgul par byung // autpal sdong bu bsregs thal ba //
translated: Blood is expelled through the mouth and throat, and it is accompanied by phlegm.🔽When it is lodged in a knot, it comes out through the throat.🔽One should lick the ashes of a burnt lotus stalk

analyzed: zhun mar sbrang rtsir bcas pa bldags // zhes bya ba la /

analyzed: khrag gi nang du mdud pa sha'i rmen bu lta bu chags pa'i nad la ni /

analyzed: sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba'i lde gu bldags na phan yon snga ma dang 'dra ste /
translated: Thus, the ashes of the root of lotus, the ashes of the root of utpala, the ashes of priyangu, which is gandha-briyangu, and the ashes of madhuka, each one of these mixed with ghee and honey, when used as a linctus, have the same benefits as mentioned before.

original: gre ba nas khrag 'byung ba spyi bag la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi nad sel bar byed do //
analyzed: gre ba nas khrag 'byung ba spyi bag la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi nad sel bar byed do //

original: khrag ni bshang ba'i lam nas ni //🔽'byung bar byed la khyad par du //
analyzed: khrag ni bshang ba'i lam nas ni // 'byung bar byed la khyad par du //
translated: Blood coming out of the anus🔽is especially cured

original: 'jam rtsi btang ba bsngags pa yin //
analyzed: 'jam rtsi btang ba bsngags pa yin //
translated: by the application of an enema.

original: zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la /
translated: Thus,

analyzed: bshang ba'i lam nas 'byung ba'i khrag gi nad la khyad par ram mchog tu 'jam rtsi mas gtong ba'i cho ga byas ba sngags pa yin la /
translated: In the case of a blood disease that comes out of the anus, the special or supreme treatment is the ritual of inserting an ointment.

analyzed: 'jam rtsi de yang khrag dang mkhris pa sel ba'i sman gyi sbyor ba'i las bya'o //
translated: The ointment should be prepared from a compound of medicines that cure blood and bile.

original: sna nas nad can khrag byung na //
analyzed: sna nas nad can khrag byung na //
translated: If a patient has a nosebleed,

original: sna sman gtang zhing blugs par bya //
analyzed: sna sman gtang zhing blugs par bya //
translated: use a nasal medication and a nasal douche.🔽Use the compound of medicines explained above,

analyzed: sngar bshad sman khu'i sbyor ba dang // 'o ma bu ram shing khu blugs //

analyzed: 'o ma sogs chu kha rar bcas //

analyzed: yang na chu ni 'ba' zhig phan // se'u 'bru'i me tog khu ba'am //
translated: Or water alone may be beneficial.🔽The juice of the cherry tree flower

analyzed: aa mra'i rus pa d'ur ba phan // zhes bya ba la /
translated: or the bone of a mango tree or a durva plant are beneficial.

original: sna nas byung ba'i khrag nad bsal ba la ni sman sna nas gtang ba'i cho ga 'o ma blugs pa la sogs pa sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: sna nas byung ba'i khrag nad bsal ba la ni sman sna nas gtang ba'i cho ga 'o ma blugs pa la sogs pa sbyar bar bya'o //
